title: Canonical embedding of the field of the rational numbers into a division ring

blocks.name: cqqh
blocks.content: Map the rationals into a field.
blocks.origin: const class cqqh { QQHom }

blocks.content: Define the canonical homomorphism from the rationals into any field. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Oct-2017.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 23-Oct-2017.)

blocks.name: qqhval
blocks.content: Value of the canonical homormorphism from the rational number to a field. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 22-Oct-2017.)

} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, universe), wceq(cfv(cqqh, c0), crn(cmpo(s0, s1, cz, cima(ccnv(c1), cfv(cui, c0)), cop(co(cv(s0), cdiv, cv(s1)), co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c2, cfv(c1, cv(s1)))))))), wceq(c3, cfv(cur, c0)))

  rneqd(cmpo(s0, s1, cz, cima(ccnv(cfv(czrh, cv(hs0))), cfv(cui, cv(hs0))), cop(co(cv(s0), cdiv, cv(s1)), co(cfv(cfv(czrh, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), cfv(cdvr, cv(hs0)), cfv(cfv(czrh, cv(hs0)), cv(s1))))), cmpo(s0, s1, cz, cima(ccnv(c1), cfv(cui, c0)), cop(co(cv(s0), cdiv, cv(s1)), co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c2, cfv(c1, cv(s1))))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  mpoeq123dv(s0, s1, cz, cima(ccnv(cfv(czrh, cv(hs0))), cfv(cui, cv(hs0))), cop(co(cv(s0), cdiv, cv(s1)), co(cfv(cfv(czrh, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), cfv(cdvr, cv(hs0)), cfv(cfv(czrh, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)))), cz, cima(ccnv(c1), cfv(cui, c0)), cop(co(cv(s0), cdiv, cv(s1)), co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c2, cfv(c1, cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  eqidd(cz, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  imaeq12d(ccnv(cfv(czrh, cv(hs0))), cfv(cui, cv(hs0)), ccnv(c1), cfv(cui, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  cnveqd(cfv(czrh, cv(hs0)), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cui)
  opeq2d(co(cv(s0), cdiv, cv(s1)), co(cfv(cfv(czrh, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), cfv(cdvr, cv(hs0)), cfv(cfv(czrh, cv(hs0)), cv(s1))), co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c2, cfv(c1, cv(s1))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq123d(cfv(cfv(czrh, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), cfv(cdvr, cv(hs0)), cfv(cfv(czrh, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)), cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c2, cfv(c1, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cdvr, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(cdvr, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cdvr)
  fveq1d(cfv(czrh, cv(hs0)), cv(s0), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))

  ax-mp(wcel(cima(ccnv(c1), cfv(cui, c0)), universe), wcel(ccnv(c1), universe))
  cnvex(c1)
  fvexi(c1, czrh, c0)
  imaexg(ccnv(c1), universe, cfv(cui, c0))

thm qqhval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Üí(QQHom ` c0)= ran((s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, s1 ‚àà(`' c1 "(Unit ` c0))‚Ü¶ <(s0[√∑]s1),((c1 ` s0)[c2](c1 ` s1))>)))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(/r ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(1r ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(ZRHom ` c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Üí(QQHom ` c0)= ran((s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, s1 ‚àà(`' c1 "(Unit ` c0))‚Ü¶ <(s0[√∑]s1),((c1 ` s0)[c2](c1 ` s1))>))), c3 =(1r ` c0))
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, cqqh, ran((s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, s1 ‚àà(`' c1 "(Unit ` c0))‚Ü¶ <(s0[√∑]s1),((c1 ` s0)[c2](c1 ` s1))>)), ran((s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, s1 ‚àà(`'(ZRHom ` hs0)"(Unit ` hs0))‚Ü¶ <(s0[√∑]s1),(((ZRHom ` hs0)` s0)[(/r ` hs0)]((ZRHom ` hs0)` s1))>)))
  rneqd((s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, s1 ‚àà(`'(ZRHom ` hs0)"(Unit ` hs0))‚Ü¶ <(s0[√∑]s1),(((ZRHom ` hs0)` s0)[(/r ` hs0)]((ZRHom ` hs0)` s1))>), (s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, s1 ‚àà(`' c1 "(Unit ` c0))‚Ü¶ <(s0[√∑]s1),((c1 ` s0)[c2](c1 ` s1))>), hs0 = c0)
  mpoeq123dv(s0, s1, cz, (`'(ZRHom ` hs0)"(Unit ` hs0)), <(s0[√∑]s1),(((ZRHom ` hs0)` s0)[(/r ` hs0)]((ZRHom ` hs0)` s1))>, cz, (`' c1 "(Unit ` c0)), <(s0[√∑]s1),((c1 ` s0)[c2](c1 ` s1))>, hs0 = c0)
  eqidd(cz, hs0 = c0)
  imaeq12d(`'(ZRHom ` hs0), (Unit ` hs0), `' c1, (Unit ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  cnveqd((ZRHom ` hs0), c1, hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cui)
  opeq2d((s0[√∑]s1), (((ZRHom ` hs0)` s0)[(/r ` hs0)]((ZRHom ` hs0)` s1)), ((c1 ` s0)[c2](c1 ` s1)), hs0 = c0)
  oveq123d(((ZRHom ` hs0)` s0), (/r ` hs0), ((ZRHom ` hs0)` s1), (c1 ` s0), c2, (c1 ` s1), hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((/r ` hs0), c2, (/r ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cdvr)
  fveq1d((ZRHom ` hs0), s0, c1, hs0 = c0)
  fveq1d((ZRHom ` hs0), s1, c1, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((ZRHom ` hs0), c1, (ZRHom ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, czrh)
  df-qqh(hs0, s0, s1)
  rnex((s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, s1 ‚àà(`' c1 "(Unit ` c0))‚Ü¶ <(s0[√∑]s1),((c1 ` s0)[c2](c1 ` s1))>))
  mpt2ex(s0, s1, cz, (`' c1 "(Unit ` c0)), <(s0[√∑]s1),((c1 ` s0)[c2](c1 ` s1))>)
  zex()
  ax-mp((`' c1 "(Unit ` c0))‚àà ùïå, `' c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  cnvex(c1)
  fvexi(c1, czrh, c0)
  imaexg(`' c1, universe, (Unit ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(ran((s0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, s1 ‚àà(`' c1 "(Unit ` c0))‚Ü¶ <(s0[√∑]s1),((c1 ` s0)[c2](c1 ` s1))>)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)

blocks.name: zrhf1ker
blocks.content: The kernel of the homomorphism from the integers to a ring, if it is injective. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 26-Oct-2017.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 23-May-2023.)

blocks.name: zrhchr
blocks.content: The kernel of the homomorphism from the integers to a ring is injective if and only if the ring has characteristic 0 . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 8-Nov-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm zrhchr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, crg), wb(wceq(cfv(cchr, c0), nat0), wf1(c1, cz, c2)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(czrh, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c0))
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, crg), wb(wceq(cfv(cchr, c0), nat0), wf1(c1, cz, c2))), wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c0)))
  3bitr2rd(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(cfv(cchr, c0), nat0), wf1(c1, cz, c2), wf1(cmpt(hs0, cz, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmg, c0), cfv(cur, c0))), cz, c2), wceq(cfv(cfv(cod, c0), cfv(cur, c0)), nat0))
  syl(wcel(c0, crg), wb(wf1(c1, cz, c2), wf1(cmpt(hs0, cz, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmg, c0), cfv(cur, c0))), cz, c2)), wceq(c1, cmpt(hs0, cz, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmg, c0), cfv(cur, c0)))))
  zrhval2(hs0, c0, c1, cfv(cmg, c0), cfv(cur, c0))
  f1eq1(c1, cmpt(hs0, cz, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmg, c0), cfv(cur, c0))), cz, c2)
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, crg), wb(wceq(cfv(cfv(cod, c0), cfv(cur, c0)), nat0), wf1(cmpt(hs0, cz, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmg, c0), cfv(cur, c0))), cz, c2)), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(cfv(cur, c0), c2))
  ringgrp(c0)
  ringidcl(c0, cfv(cur, c0), c2)
  odf1(hs0, c0, cfv(cur, c0), c2, cfv(cod, c0), cmpt(hs0, cz, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmg, c0), cfv(cur, c0))), cfv(cmg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cmg, c0))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, cz, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmg, c0), cfv(cur, c0))))
  a1i(wcel(c0, crg), wb(wceq(cfv(cfv(cod, c0), cfv(cur, c0)), nat0), wceq(cfv(cchr, c0), nat0)))
  eqeq1i(cfv(cfv(cod, c0), cfv(cur, c0)), nat0, cfv(cchr, c0))
  chrval(cfv(cod, c0), cfv(cur, c0), cfv(cchr, c0), c0)
  eqid(cfv(cod, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cur, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cchr, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cmg, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cur, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cod, c0))
}

thm zrhchr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Ring ‚Üí((chr ` c0)= 0 ‚Üî(c1 : ‚Ñ§ ‚Ü£ c2)))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(ZRHom ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(0 ` c0)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà Ring ‚Üí((chr ` c0)= 0 ‚Üî(c1 : ‚Ñ§ ‚Ü£ c2))), c3 =(0 ` c0))
  3bitr2rd(c0 ‚àà Ring, (chr ` c0)= 0, (c1 : ‚Ñ§ ‚Ü£ c2), ((hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚Ü¶(hs0[(.g ` c0)](1r ` c0))): ‚Ñ§ ‚Ü£ c2), ((od ` c0)`(1r ` c0))= 0)
  syl(c0 ‚àà Ring, ((c1 : ‚Ñ§ ‚Ü£ c2)‚Üî((hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚Ü¶(hs0[(.g ` c0)](1r ` c0))): ‚Ñ§ ‚Ü£ c2)), c1 =(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚Ü¶(hs0[(.g ` c0)](1r ` c0))))
  zrhval2(hs0, c0, c1, (.g ` c0), (1r ` c0))
  f1eq1(c1, (hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚Ü¶(hs0[(.g ` c0)](1r ` c0))), cz, c2)
  syl2anc(c0 ‚àà Ring, (((od ` c0)`(1r ` c0))= 0 ‚Üî((hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚Ü¶(hs0[(.g ` c0)](1r ` c0))): ‚Ñ§ ‚Ü£ c2)), c0 ‚àà Grp, (1r ` c0)‚àà c2)
  ringgrp(c0)
  ringidcl(c0, (1r ` c0), c2)
  odf1(hs0, c0, (1r ` c0), c2, (od ` c0), (hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚Ü¶(hs0[(.g ` c0)](1r ` c0))), (.g ` c0))
  eqid((.g ` c0))
  eqid((hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚Ü¶(hs0[(.g ` c0)](1r ` c0))))
  a1i(c0 ‚àà Ring, (((od ` c0)`(1r ` c0))= 0 ‚Üî(chr ` c0)= 0))
  eqeq1i(((od ` c0)`(1r ` c0)), nat0, (chr ` c0))
  chrval((od ` c0), (1r ` c0), (chr ` c0), c0)
  eqid((od ` c0))
  eqid((1r ` c0))
  eqid((chr ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((.g ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c((1r ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c((od ` c0))
}

blocks.name: zrhker
blocks.content: The kernel of the homomorphism from the integers to a ring with characteristic 0. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 8-Nov-2017.)

blocks.name: zrhunitpreima
blocks.content: The preimage by ` ZRHom ` of the unit of a division ring is ` ( ZZ \ { 0 } ) ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 22-Oct-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm zrhunitpreima(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cdr), wceq(cfv(cchr, c0), nat0)), wceq(cima(ccnv(c1), cfv(cui, c0)), cdif(cz, csn(nat0))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(czrh, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c0))
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cdr), wceq(cfv(cchr, c0), nat0)), wceq(cima(ccnv(c1), cfv(cui, c0)), cdif(cz, csn(nat0)))), wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c0)))
  3eqtrd(cima(ccnv(c1), cfv(cui, c0)), cdif(cz, csn(nat0)), cima(ccnv(c1), cdif(c2, csn(cfv(c0g, c0)))), cdif(cima(ccnv(c1), c2), cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cfv(c0g, c0)))), wa(wcel(c0, cdr), wceq(cfv(cchr, c0), nat0)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cdr), wceq(cfv(cchr, c0), nat0), wceq(cima(ccnv(c1), cfv(cui, c0)), cima(ccnv(c1), cdif(c2, csn(cfv(c0g, c0))))))
  imaeq2d(ccnv(c1), cfv(cui, c0), cdif(c2, csn(cfv(c0g, c0))), wcel(c0, cdr))
  simprbi(wcel(c0, cdr), wceq(cfv(cui, c0), cdif(c2, csn(cfv(c0g, c0)))), wcel(c0, crg))
  isdrng(c0, cfv(cui, c0), c2, cfv(c0g, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cui, c0))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cdr), wceq(cfv(cchr, c0), nat0), wceq(cima(ccnv(c1), cdif(c2, csn(cfv(c0g, c0)))), cdif(cima(ccnv(c1), c2), cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cfv(c0g, c0))))))
  3syl(wcel(c0, cdr), wceq(cima(ccnv(c1), cdif(c2, csn(cfv(c0g, c0)))), cdif(cima(ccnv(c1), c2), cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cfv(c0g, c0))))), wcel(c0, crg), wfun(c1))
  3syl(wcel(c0, crg), wfun(c1), wcel(c1, co(zring, crh, c0)), wf(c1, cz, c2))
  ffun(c1, cz, c2)
  difpreima(c1, c2, csn(cfv(c0g, c0)))
  difeq12d(cima(ccnv(c1), c2), cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cfv(c0g, c0))), cz, csn(nat0), wa(wcel(c0, cdr), wceq(cfv(cchr, c0), nat0)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cdr), wceq(cfv(cchr, c0), nat0), wceq(cima(ccnv(c1), c2), cz))
  4syl(wcel(c0, cdr), wceq(cima(ccnv(c1), c2), cz), wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, co(zring, crh, c0)), wf(c1, cz, c2))
  zrhrhm(c0, c1)
  rhmf(c1, zring, c0, cz, c2)
  zringbas()
  fimacnv(c1, cz, c2)
  sylan(wcel(c0, cdr), wceq(cfv(cchr, c0), nat0), wceq(cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cfv(c0g, c0))), csn(nat0)), wcel(c0, crg))
  drngring(c0)
  biimpa(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(cfv(cchr, c0), nat0), wceq(cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cfv(c0g, c0))), csn(nat0)))
  zrhker(c0, c1, cfv(c0g, c0), c2)
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c0))
}

thm zrhunitpreima(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà DivRing ‚àß(chr ` c0)= 0)‚Üí(`' c1 "(Unit ` c0))=(‚Ñ§ \ { 0 }))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(ZRHom ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(0 ` c0)
} = {
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà DivRing ‚àß(chr ` c0)= 0)‚Üí(`' c1 "(Unit ` c0))=(‚Ñ§ \ { 0 })), c3 =(0 ` c0))
  3eqtrd((`' c1 "(Unit ` c0)), (‚Ñ§ \ { 0 }), (`' c1 "(c2 \ {(0 ` c0)})), ((`' c1 " c2)\(`' c1 " {(0 ` c0)})), (c0 ‚àà DivRing ‚àß(chr ` c0)= 0))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà DivRing, (chr ` c0)= 0, (`' c1 "(Unit ` c0))=(`' c1 "(c2 \ {(0 ` c0)})))
  imaeq2d(`' c1, (Unit ` c0), (c2 \ {(0 ` c0)}), c0 ‚àà DivRing)
  simprbi(c0 ‚àà DivRing, (Unit ` c0)=(c2 \ {(0 ` c0)}), c0 ‚àà Ring)
  isdrng(c0, (Unit ` c0), c2, (0 ` c0))

blocks.name: qqhval2
blocks.content: Value of the canonical homormorphism from the rational number when the target ring is a division ring. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 26-Oct-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm qqhval2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cdr), wceq(cfv(cchr, c0), nat0)), wceq(cfv(cqqh, c0), cmpt(s0, cq, co(cfv(c1, cfv(cnumer, cv(s0))), c2, cfv(c1, cfv(cdenom, cv(s0)))))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cdvr, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(czrh, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)

thm qqhvq(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdr), wceq(cfv(cchr, c0), nat0)), w3a(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wne(c2, nat0))), wceq(cfv(cfv(cqqh, c0), co(c1, cdiv, c2)), co(cfv(c3, c1), c4, cfv(c3, c2))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cdvr, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(czrh, c0))
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(cfv(cqqh, c0), co(c1, cdiv, c2)), co(cfv(c3, c1), c4, cfv(c3, c2)), co(cfv(c3, cfv(cnumer, co(c1, cdiv, c2))), c4, cfv(c3, cfv(cdenom, co(c1, cdiv, c2)))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdr), wceq(cfv(cchr, c0), nat0)), w3a(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wne(c2, nat0))))
  syldan(wa(wcel(c0, cdr), wceq(cfv(cchr, c0), nat0)), w3a(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wne(c2, nat0)), wceq(cfv(cfv(cqqh, c0), co(c1, cdiv, c2)), co(cfv(c3, cfv(cnumer, co(c1, cdiv, c2))), c4, cfv(c3, cfv(cdenom, co(c1, cdiv, c2))))), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, c2), cq))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdr), wceq(cfv(cchr, c0), nat0)), w3a(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wne(c2, nat0))), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, c2), cq), wcel(c1, cq), wcel(c2, cq), wne(c2, nat0))
  sseldi(c1, cq, cz, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdr), wceq(cfv(cchr, c0), nat0)), w3a(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wne(c2, nat0))))
  simpr1(wa(wcel(c0, cdr), wceq(cfv(cchr, c0), nat0)), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wne(c2, nat0))
  sseldi(c2, cq, cz, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdr), wceq(cfv(cchr, c0), nat0)), w3a(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wne(c2, nat0))))
  zssq()
  simpr2(wa(wcel(c0, cdr), wceq(cfv(cchr, c0), nat0)), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wne(c2, nat0))
  simpr3(wa(wcel(c0, cdr), wceq(cfv(cchr, c0), nat0)), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wne(c2, nat0))
  qdivcl(c1, c2)
  qqhvval(c0, co(c1, cdiv, c2), c3, c4, c5)
  qqhval2lem(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5)
}

thm qqhvq(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ (((c0 ‚àà DivRing ‚àß(chr ` c0)= 0)‚àß(c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c2 ‚â† 0))‚Üí((QQHom ` c0)`(c1[√∑]c2))=((c3 ` c1)[c4](c3 ` c2)))
  ‚ä£ c5 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(/r ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(ZRHom ` c0)
} = {
  eqtrd(((QQHom ` c0)`(c1[√∑]c2)), ((c3 ` c1)[c4](c3 ` c2)), ((c3 `(numer `(c1[√∑]c2)))[c4](c3 `(denom `(c1[√∑]c2)))), ((c0 ‚àà DivRing ‚àß(chr ` c0)= 0)‚àß(c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c2 ‚â† 0)))
  syldan((c0 ‚àà DivRing ‚àß(chr ` c0)= 0), (c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c2 ‚â† 0), ((QQHom ` c0)`(c1[√∑]c2))=((c3 `(numer `(c1[√∑]c2)))[c4](c3 `(denom `(c1[√∑]c2)))), (c1[√∑]c2)‚àà ‚Ñö)
  syl3anc(((c0 ‚àà DivRing ‚àß(chr ` c0)= 0)‚àß(c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c2 ‚â† 0)), (c1[√∑]c2)‚àà ‚Ñö, c1 ‚àà ‚Ñö, c2 ‚àà ‚Ñö, c2 ‚â† 0)
  sseldi(c1, cq, cz, ((c0 ‚àà DivRing ‚àß(chr ` c0)= 0)‚àß(c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c2 ‚â† 0)))
  simpr1((c0 ‚àà DivRing ‚àß(chr ` c0)= 0), c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, c2 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, c2 ‚â† 0)
  sseldi(c2, cq, cz, ((c0 ‚àà DivRing ‚àß(chr ` c0)= 0)‚àß(c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c2 ‚â† 0)))
  zssq()
  simpr2((c0 ‚àà DivRing ‚àß(chr ` c0)= 0), c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, c2 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, c2 ‚â† 0)
  simpr3((c0 ‚àà DivRing ‚àß(chr ` c0)= 0), c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, c2 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, c2 ‚â† 0)
  qdivcl(c1, c2)
  qqhvval(c0, (c1[√∑]c2), c3, c4, c5)
  qqhval2lem(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5)
}

blocks.name: qqhghm
blocks.content: The ` QQHom ` homomorphism is a group homomorphism if the target structure is a division ring. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 9-Nov-2017.)

blocks.name: qqhrhm
blocks.content: The ` QQHom ` homomorphism is a ring homomorphism if the target structure is a field. If the target structure is a division ring, it is a group homomorphism, but not a ring homomorphism, because it does not preserve the ring multiplication operation. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 29-Oct-2017.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: qqhnm
blocks.content: The norm of the image by ` QQHom ` of a rational number in a topological division ring. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 8-Nov-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm qqhnm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cin(cnrg, cdr)), wcel(c1, cnlm), wceq(cfv(cchr, c0), nat0)), wcel(c2, cq)), wceq(cfv(c3, cfv(cfv(cqqh, c0), c2)), cfv(cabs, c2)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cnm, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(czlm, c0))
} = {
  3eqtrrd(cfv(c3, cfv(cfv(cqqh, c0), c2)), cfv(cabs, c2), cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cnumer, c2), cdiv, cfv(cdenom, c2))), co(cfv(cabs, cfv(cnumer, c2)), cdiv, cfv(cabs, cfv(cdenom, c2))), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cin(cnrg, cdr)), wcel(c1, cnlm), wceq(cfv(cchr, c0), nat0)), wcel(c2, cq)))
  syl(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cin(cnrg, cdr)), wcel(c1, cnlm), wceq(cfv(cchr, c0), nat0)), wcel(c2, cq)), wceq(cfv(cabs, c2), cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cnumer, c2), cdiv, cfv(cdenom, c2)))), wcel(c2, cq))
  fveq2d(cabs, c2, co(cfv(cnumer, c2), cdiv, cfv(cdenom, c2)), wcel(c2, cq))
  qeqnumdivden(c2)
  absdivd(cfv(cnumer, c2), cfv(cdenom, c2), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cin(cnrg, cdr)), wcel(c1, cnlm), wceq(cfv(cchr, c0), nat0)), wcel(c2, cq)))
  zcnd(cfv(cnumer, c2), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cin(cnrg, cdr)), wcel(c1, cnlm), wceq(cfv(cchr, c0), nat0)), wcel(c2, cq)))
  nncnd(cfv(cdenom, c2), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cin(cnrg, cdr)), wcel(c1, cnlm), wceq(cfv(cchr, c0), nat0)), wcel(c2, cq)))

} = {
  simprd(w3a(wcel(c0, cin(cnrg, cdr)), wcel(c1, cnlm), wceq(cfv(cchr, c0), nat0)), wcel(cfv(cqqh, c0), co(c2, ccn, c3)), wcel(nat0, cq))

  mpbir2and(w3a(wcel(c0, cin(cnrg, cdr)), wcel(c1, cnlm), wceq(cfv(cchr, c0), nat0)), wcel(cfv(cqqh, c0), cfv(co(c2, ccnp, cfv(cmopn, cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))))), nat0)), wf(cfv(cqqh, c0), cq, cfv(cbs, c0)), wral(hs2, crp, wrex(hs1, crp, wral(hs0, cq, wi(wbr(co(nat0, cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(cq, cq)), cv(hs0)), clt, cv(hs1)), wbr(co(cfv(cfv(cqqh, c0), nat0), cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))), cfv(cfv(cqqh, c0), cv(hs0))), clt, cv(hs2)))))))
  ralrimiva(hs2, crp, w3a(wcel(c0, cin(cnrg, cdr)), wcel(c1, cnlm), wceq(cfv(cchr, c0), nat0)), wrex(hs1, crp, wral(hs0, cq, wi(wbr(co(nat0, cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(cq, cq)), cv(hs0)), clt, cv(hs1)), wbr(co(cfv(cfv(cqqh, c0), nat0), cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))), cfv(cfv(cqqh, c0), cv(hs0))), clt, cv(hs2))))))
  syl2anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cin(cnrg, cdr)), wcel(c1, cnlm), wceq(cfv(cchr, c0), nat0)), wcel(cv(hs2), crp)), wrex(hs1, crp, wral(hs0, cq, wi(wbr(co(nat0, cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(cq, cq)), cv(hs0)), clt, cv(hs1)), wbr(co(cfv(cfv(cqqh, c0), nat0), cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))), cfv(cfv(cqqh, c0), cv(hs0))), clt, cv(hs2))))), wcel(cv(hs2), crp), wral(hs0, cq, wi(wbr(co(nat0, cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(cq, cq)), cv(hs0)), clt, cv(hs2)), wbr(co(cfv(cfv(cqqh, c0), nat0), cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))), cfv(cfv(cqqh, c0), cv(hs0))), clt, cv(hs2)))))
